subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin scored three goals and had the assist on the winning goal in overtime, and the Washington Capitals defeated the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins, 5-4, for their 14th straight win.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin scored three goals and had the assist on the winning goal in overtime, and the Washington Capitals defeated the visiting Pittsburgh Penguins, 5-4, for their 14th straight win.
